QuestData.Title: Horses for Duskhaven
QuestData.Description: Saving the horses might've saved the rest of the town. They have plenty of carriages in Duskhaven, but not enough horses to pull them.$B$BGo tell Mayor Armstead that the horses you saved are at her disposal.$B$BI'll get things ready and join you in a bit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gwen Armstead in Duskhaven.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $N. I think I speak for everyone when I say the sooner we get out of here, the better.
